/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from under a large concrete overpass, which is characterized by its curved arches and a repeating pattern of rectangular cutouts. The overpass casts a shadow on the street below, adding depth to the scene.

The street itself is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of mostly beige and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. Cars are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the rhythm of daily life in the city.

The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the overpass and gives a sense of scale to the cityscape.
